sentences.en: Buying gifts for those we love should be a heartwarming experience.
sentences.cn: 为所爱的人选购礼物应该是一种很温暖的体验.

sentences.en: Dante: So this is what they call a heartwarming family reunion, eh?
sentences.cn: 但丁: 看来这就是所谓的温馨家庭聚会了, 嗯?

sentences.en: Inspiring , wise , humorous, and heartwarming, these books are the perfect gifts for that very special sibling.
sentences.cn: 这本鼓舞人心 、 充满著智慧与幽默的小书,绝对是给他们的一份最棒的礼物.

sentences.en: Is there a sight more heartwarming than a family reunion?
sentences.cn: 还有比家人团聚更感人的场面 吗 ?

sentences.en: Newspapers, blogs, TV stations, they all love to talk about something new and heartwarming.
sentences.cn: 报纸, 博客, 电台, 他们都喜欢谈论一些新的温暖人心的事情.

sentences.en: The love and interest shown to our children has been particularly heartwarming.
sentences.cn: 人们对我们的孩子表现出的喜爱和兴趣特别让我们感到温暖.

sentences.en: Those heartwarming comments touched horseman deeply .'Tm most grateful for what you have said.
sentences.cn: 这些暖人心房的话深深地打动了这位骑手的心.

trans.tran_en: making you feel happy because you see other people being happy or kind to each other
